title: Pokemon Flare
description:
This hack is a classic journey through Kanto... backwards....... or is it?

Team Rocket is going after the three birds! Will you be able to stop them? Come along on this adventure and find out!

title: Pokémon Flora Sky
description: You'll come to a land with many mysteries of the legendary Pokémon. After the battle between Dialga and Palkia, the portal between Torn World - the world of Giratina and real world is opened. Giratina appears and brings many unanticapated dangers. And you must close this portal before its too late. Meanwhile, Team Magma and Aqua are seeking the legendary Fire and Water type Pokémon to dominate their world. Together with other friends, our hero will prevent the heat of the legendary Pokemon by the actions of Team Magma and Aqua. What will help Groudon and Kyogre calm down? For more stories, let's play..

title: Pokemon Freezai's Mountain
alternate_titles: Pokemon Freezai's Mountain (Final) (Freezai) | Pokemon Freezai’s Mountain (v03Dec2024) (Freezai)
description:
Pokemon Freezai’s Mountain is a Pokémon escape room ROM hack focused on resource collection and solving five complex Pokémon battle puzzles. Designed with the Pokémon emerald expansion project, this game is a perfect fit for puzzle enthusiasts who enjoy challenges that test creativity and deep Pokémon knowledge.

The puzzles are crafted to be difficult but fair, avoiding frustrating or tedious mechanics. Quality-of-life features include the ability to run from trainer battles, streamlining the puzzle-solving experience. Custom AI is also integrated to handle unique battle scenarios, providing unexpected twists for players to discover.

title: Pokémon Fuligin
alternate_titles: Pokemon Fuligin (Completed) (v14Aug2025) (Sloo) | Pokemon Fuligin | Pokemon Fuligin
description: You are a young boy or girl who lives with your mom and brother in the small town of Alora. Professor Oak has a lab there and the story starts basically just like the original fire red with getting your first pokemon and pokedex and so on. You soon find that your brother is involved with team rocket and drags you into trouble as well. He later convinces you to join them because, hey, they're not so bad... You must then work your way up through through the ranks and eventually lead team rocket. In the meantime, a couple of pokemon bent on world domination run wild and terrorize the population.

title: Pokémon Fusion 3
description: Pokemon Fusion 3 is a GBA Rom Hack by Grillo & Lugre based on Pokemon Emerald with various Pokemon Fusions, including Pokemon from the Alola Region.

title: Pokémon Fusion Origins
description: Pokémon Fusion Origins is a GBA Rom Hack. Be ready to face a whole new scenario in this new adventure at Kanto, where you will meet meet more than 300 different fusions and a new facet of Pokémon battling. Be ready to keep your senses to the sharpest, and discover what's behind the scenes and its colorful origin!

title: Pokémon Gaia
description:
The storied Orbtus region was once populated by a prosperous civilization. They created several monuments to their gods and guardians. Their untimely demise was brought about by a series of disastrous earthquakes; all that remains of their society are their temples, idols and story, as relics of the past.

In the present day, local archaeologist and Pokémon Professor, Professor Redwood, has noticed an increase in the region's seismic activity. Propelled by a growing concern for Orbtus' safety, he seeks the assistance of new Pokemon Trainers with a flair for adventure in the rural Celanto Town, a seaside town near the mysterious Totem Poles, and your home! Will you, along with the help of the Professor and your rival, be able to prevent the earth from consuming the region once more?

Website: https://www.pokecommunity.com/showthread.php?t=326118

title: Pokémon Garbage Green
description:
Have you ever wanted to Nuzlocke a Pokemon game with only bad Pokemon?

Have you ever wanted to do that while doing economic research on resource management and risk-analysis?

If so, Pokemon Garbage Green is the game for you! At long last and over multiple years of development, we're releasing Garbage Green to the public.

Story:
The boundaries of what we couldn't change were set to: Opposing trainers and Pokemon Base Stats/Abilities/Learnsets. Everything else was fair game, but making the ridiculously easy trainers of FRLG difficult took A LOT of creativity and balance testing. That creativity was massively intensified by the main draw of the challenge, gauntlets.

    Our one exception is that Koga's Weezing is lowered to level 39 for exp management between Koga and Sabrina


If you're unfamiliar with gauntlets in romhacks, here's a quick guide to how they work in Garbage Green:

    Many routes, caves, and buildings trap you in and force you to fight many trainers
    The vast majority of healing items are removed from the game and none are buyable before being able to challenge the Elite 4
    All places with gauntlets are non-FLY-able, TELEPORT-able, and Escape Rope-able, so there are no ways to get out
    Thus, managing your team's resources with HP and PP is extremely important
    Many gauntlets are inaccessible after you leave with valuable items hidden behind optional trainers, and one gauntlet requires you get encounters mid-gauntlet


Encounters are designed to be as bad as possible for the upcoming split of the game, and were not oppressively powerful for the previous bossfight. However, because FRLG trainers are very underleveled and easy, for there to be sufficient encounter variety, many Pokemon will never evolve or have had their evolution delayed.

    The question we asked for a mon to be in the game was "Is Mudkip trash after you can get it in GarbageGreen?" Not "Is the Mudkip line trash?"
    For that reason a number of mid-tier mons are available lategame.


The game is optimized for the Nuzlocke challenge - Gauntlets will not work well if you're not nuzlocking as trainers don't reset when you wipe. That being said feel free to enjoy the game in whatever way you like.

If you have any constructive criticism or feedback or notice any bugs, please post them in the forum thread!

Features:

    Edited encounters to have only Pokemon from the National Dex that are bad for FRLG. Every Route's Wild Pokemon has been changed.
    Changed the starters to Slugma, Paras, and Goldeen
    Changed static Pokemon encounters - many encounters that have overworld sprites are now Ditto
    Restricted access to certain areas - linearized Kanto and provided many new NPCs to block off parts
    Made trades an integral part of the resource management, trading good mons for bad mons holding items. You also always have an option to do the trades, because they ask for a mon from a location rather than a specific Pokemon.
    Serious nerfs to PP of many moves to require more resource management. All Setup moves are now 1PP to make it not oppressively strong in bossfights
    All infinitely purchasable TMs have been removed
    The only healing items purchasable are Full Restores at Indigo Plateau
    Rare Candies are sellable for $1 in the Pokemart
    Poison out of battle has been disabled to make poison not an insta-wipe in gauntlets
    EVs have been removed
    Changed the opening cutscene

title: Pokémon Giratina Strikes Back
description:
You are a 13 year old boy/girl who's father owns a large company called EDGE Co. in the Lunoh Region. One morning you father asks you to meet him at his office. There he asks you to fulfill his childhood dream of becoming a Pokemon Master, because he never had the chance when he was younger. You accept and receive your very first Pokemon, and Eevee!
And so your adventure begins! On the way you will meet many unique people, and face many challenges including the evil Team Genesis who plan to release Giratina from the Distortion World and use his power for world domination. Of course it's up you you to stop them, you are the protagonist after all.

title: Pokemon Girls Hunter
alternate_titles: Pokémon Girls Hunter | pokemon girls hunter | pokémon girls hunter
description:
Pokemon Girls Hunter is a Pokemon GBA Rom Hack by fz15 based on  Pokemon Fire Red in English

Featured items
A couple of additional Pokémon from generations to come.
A different iteration of the Mega Evolution.
Pokémon from previous or subsequent generations!
Mystery Gift can be unlocked with special event tickets, and MG Receptionists are located on the upper floors of all Pokémon Centers.
You will start off with 10 Pokemon to choose from when you play through this game.

title: Pokemon Girls Hunter 2
alternate_titles: Pokémon Girls Hunter 2 | pokemon girls hunter 2 | pokémon girls hunter 2
description:
Pokemon Girls Hunter 2 is a GBA ROM Hack by fz15 based on Pokemon Fire Red in English.

After Puela Region became a peaceful region again, Human Balls were discovered in Tiara Region this time, to make sure what happened in Puela happened again, Ankell decided to travel to Tiara to find out what really happened. She began to hunt for girls like how Seda did. Of course, trying to find out how Human Balls work in Tiara is not the only reason why she decided to start her journey, there’s another more important reason for her to go to Tiara: She wants to find out who killed Zarla, her girlfriend who lost her life in Tiara many years ago.

title: Pokemon Girls Hunter 3
alternate_titles: Pokémon Girls Hunter 3 | pokemon girls hunter 3 | pokémon girls hunter 3
description:
Pokemon Girls Hunter 3 is a GBA ROM Hack by fz15 based on Pokemon Fire Red. 

Pokemon Girls hunter 3 is an 18+ GBA ROM Hack and similar to its prequel, you catch girls instead of pokemon… It has a new region, a new story, 50 catchable girls & 10 kinds of pokemorphed girls.

Norelia, an orphan who was adopted along with a girl called Aubree, decided to work for the kingdom after Fradia, the soldier who adopted them went missing. They worked under Lomie, one of the generals of the kingdom. But Lomie was manipulative and did not give them good Pokemon, they were only given weak ones like Rattata and Zubat so that she can always keep the girls in control, But Norelia’s ambition cannot be held back so easily…

title: Pokemon Girls Hunter Halloween
alternate_titles: Pokémon Girls Hunter Halloween | pokemon girls hunter halloween | pokémon girls hunter halloween
description:
Pokemon Girls Hunter Halloween is a  Pokemon GBA Rom Hack by fz15 based on Pokemon Fire Red in English.

Pokemon Girl Hunter Halloween is actually a new GBA Hack ROM that has a new story, a new region, new girls and pokemorph girls and gyms… But it’s a short game for Halloween. It will have more DLCs in the future where you can get more gyms, pokemon girls. I made this gameplay video in Pokemon Girls Hunter Halloween + Thanksgiving DLC. It’s actually completed in English and it will have more DLC in the future. And now, Let’s play baby!

This one is a short game made for Halloween. It is pretty short compared to Pokemon Girls Hunter 1 and 2. However, It’s possible that more content will be added in the future. For now, it’s still impossible to complete the Pokedex.

title: Pokémon Glazed Version
description: Pokémon Glazed Version is a rom hack of Pokémon Emerald Version that was released November 30, 2012. The game starts in the Tunod Region with a new Johto Region and the small Rankor Archipelago to end. It was created by Lucbui.

title: Pokemon Harvestcraft
description:
Trevenant is the ruler of all Pokemon in the woods. They are living happily together. One day, many people came and cut down a big number of trees. Trevenant has asked the Harvest Goddess for help, but he is disappointed quickly because the Harvest Goddess quickly fell in love with one of the lumbers – Eric. When they get married later, Trevenant realized that he could get the power of the Harvest Goddess. After asking Kappa – Harvest Goddess’s brother, Trevenant managed to trap people inside the town and he even tried to kill the baby of Harvest Goddess. He failed. He was told that someone would stop him, for sure.

One year has been passed since that accident. In the morning, Trevenant chased the Harvest Goddess’s family. Eric and Harvest Baby have escaped, but the Harvest Goddess was not so lucky like that. At this time, you are a 21 years old adult and being trapped inside the town (of course Trevenant caused this). Can you free, release town’s people out of this accident?

title: Pokemon Heart & Soul
description: Pokemon Heart & Soul is a modern re-imagining of Johto built on the Modern Emerald decomp. It blends elements of Pokémon Gold, Silver, Crystal, and HeartGold/SoulSilver into a fully completed, faithful-yet-fresh experience. Featuring Gen 3 mechanics, modern quality-of-life updates, and extensive playtesting, Heart & Soul delivers the definitive Johto adventure on GBA. Completely open source, it also serves as a foundation for future Johto ROM hacks.

title: Pokemon Heart and Soul
alternate_titles: Pokèmon Heart and Soul | Pokèmon - Heart and Soul | Pokemon Heart & Soul | Pokèmon Heart & Soul | Pokèmon - Heart & Soul
description: Pokémon Heart & Soul brings the classic Johto Region and its iconic story to the world of modern GBA decomp hacking. Built on the Modern Emerald decomp, this project offers a fresh take on the GSC/HGSS experience, blending key aspects of the Gen 2 and Gen 4 games, while incorporating many modern QoL features, as well as some familiar Gen 3 mechanics. Not only is Heart & Soul (HnS) a first-of-its-kind, fully completed, playtested, and largely faithful GSC remake / HGSS demake, it's also completely open source, and is intended to be a base for a new generation of Johto rom hacks.

title: Pokemon Hoenn Adventures
description: Hoenn Adventures is a remastering of Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire with a series of new features such as graphical improvements, division of physical and special attacks, sprite improvements, among many other things. This ROMHack is a remastering of Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire so, as would be logical, it has the same story as these installments; however, this HackROM brings some changed details to make this game a totally different experience.

title: Pokémon Hyper Emerald
alternate_titles: Pokemon Hyper Emerald v5.5 | Pokemon Hyper Emerald
description:
This game boasts numerous features including Mega Evolution, Z-moves Gigantamax, Pokémon moves and skills up to Generation 8, a challenging hard mode, expanded sidequests, and much more. The latest update introduces a plethora of new content inspired by Generation 8, specifically “Pokémon Sword” and “Pokémon Shield,” without overwhelming the existing system. It also enriches the narrative with fresh plots, fully realizing the prophecy introduced in Ultra Green IV.

Despite facing various challenges stemming from the pandemic and personal commitments, the development team persevered. Potato Chips spearheaded the creation of new abilities and special effects spanning eight generations. Furacão and other new team members contributed to trait and skill development. Feiyixiang refined the combat system and polished unfinished aspects. Cat Play contributed new Pokémon designs and character maps, while Waji crafted additional storylines beyond the initial weeks.

title: Pokemon Ice Blue Version
description:
Articuno has frozen the world, can you find the legendary “Phoenix” and save the world? Play Pokemon Ice Blue to find out!

Fun Fact: The author created this game for his daughter as a gift.

title: Pokémon Inclement Emerald
alternate_titles: Inclement Emerald | Pokemon - Inclement Emerald (v1.13) (Buffel Saft)
description: Inclement Emerald is my third difficulty and catch em’ all style hack, and much like the previous two, it's heavily inspired by Drayano’s famous hacks. It started out as a binary hack back in 2018, and has since been redone from scratch using the pokeemerald decompilation project. It's intended to offer a modern, more challenging take on the Hoenn region, and is full of quality-of-life improvements, new systems that streamline Pokémon training, and extra events that should freshen things up a little.

title: Pokémon Inclement Emerald EX
alternate_titles: pokemon inclement emerald gx | Pokemon Inclement Emerald GX | pokémon inclement emerald gx
description: Pokemon Inclement Emerald EX is the same game as Pokemon Inclement Emerald but adds cosmetic changes, a lot of toggleable enhancements and features Nuzlocke & Egglocke Mode, Random Battles, Scalemon, Randomized Encounters, Minimal Grind Features, Alternative Shinies, Updated Party & Summary screen, and Much More!

title: Pokémon Inflamed Red
description: Pokemon Inflamed Red is a QOL Difficulty hack which will allow you to catch all Pokemon from Generation 1-8, including Hisui mons. It is a difficulty hack similar to Inclement Emerald, with EV training not required but recommended. Other trainer's don't have EVs so its your choice if you want to train. The bag and switch mode are allowed by default, but you can disallow the bag and enable set if you want!

title: Pokémon Islas Doradas
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokemon Kanlara Ultimate
description:
Pokemon Kanlara Ultimate is the sister game to Kanlara Adventures. It is supposed to provide the most enjoyable way of exploring the region of Kanlara yet.

Kanlara is the region where you were born. You spawn here, and you meet up with your childhood friend and rival. You are informed that the Professor wants to see both of you.

At the Lab, Professor Woke lets you know that apparently, Kanlara is under attack by a group known as Team Rocket.

You receive your first Pokemon, and together you and your rival set out on your adventure.
Your goal is to become the best trainer you can be, but also to put a wrench in Team Rocket’s plans and make sure they’re put in their place.

Later, it becomes apparent that Team Rocket is gaining too much power, and the entire fate of Kanlara will rest on your shoulder as you embark on your path towards the final battle, which will decide it all…

title: Pokémon Kanto Ultimate
alternate_titles: Pokemon Kanto Ultimate V2 | Pokemon Kanto Ultimate
description: Embark on a challenging journey through a revamped Kanto, featuring a rounded-off story, increased difficulty, and appearances by all legendary Pokemon. The game offers a DS-style tileset, a dynamic Day/Night System, and expanded regions with Tohjo Falls, Mt. Silver, Southern Island, and Mirage Island. Encounter Alolan, Galarian, and Hisuian forms, updated sprites, and a Physical/Special Split. Enjoy forgettable HMs, infinite TMs, and two new rivals inspired by the manga. Discover Johto and Hoenn with overworld placements of Gym Leaders and Elite Four members for rematchable encounters. Encounter iconic characters from the first three generations, adding an extra challenge. Engage in special events for legendary Pokemon, explore unique abilities/types/moves/stats changes, and more. With revamped trainers, Jessie & James battles, and Kanto starters in their Yellow locations, this game promises an immersive and comprehensive Pokemon adventure.

title: Pokemon Korosu
description:
This is a story of a young lady who finds herself in a difficult situation. Her family has been killed and she has been kidnapped by a harsh, mafia-like criminal group and has been doomed into a life of human slavery. PredictablyEventually, she escapes(with some help) and she sets out for a quest to get revenge against those who have ruined her life.
The game will take place in two very familiar regions. At first it will take place in the Sevii Islands. The 2nd part it will take place in Kanto. Both are very different from their originals. The Sevii Islands have become unstable and nearly all of them are controlled by different criminal groups of varying degrees of strength. Kanto is affected by the events Pokemon Outlaw and is in a grim condition, much different from the Kanto we all know and love.

Then challenge the elite Summoners at the World Championships and gain the prestigious title of the Champion. But little do you know, a more sinister evil is at work to try to rule over Valoran...

title: Pokemon Legends Arceus GBA
description: Pokémon leyends es un hack rom gba en español aún en beta creado por darlex gaming. Vuelve a hisui, con parte de la región disponible y gran variedad de pokémon hasta la novena generación, con las formas paldea.

description: Este juego está basado en el Pokémon Let's Go Eevee de la versión de Nintendo Switch. Esto es un demake del mismo, realizado en base Fire Red por Kevin PokeFan.

title: Pokémon Let's Go Lugia
description: Let's Go Lugia tiene como objetivo hacer que el usuario retroceda en el tiempo y juegue un hackrom, solo con los Pokémon de Johto y sus evoluciones.

title: Pokémon Let's Go Lugia
description:
Let's Go Lugia tiene como objetivo hacer que el usuario retroceda en el tiempo y juegue un hackrom, solo con los Pokémon de Johto y sus evoluciones.

Características:
Algunos Pokémon de Kanto se agregaron debido a que los Líderes de Gimnasio o Alto Mando usaron estos Pokémon, haciendo un total de 199.
Todas las piedras evolutivas en la Tienda.
Es posible capturar TODOS los POKéMON siendo MEWTWO y LUGIA solo con ASH, y HO-OH y MEW solo con MAY.
Mapas nuevos (basados ​​en la región de Johto, pero no del todo).
Movimientos actualizados.
Pokémon de Johto visibles en el mapa, Kanto solo en la hierba.
Pokédex con información sobre cómo evolucionar Pokémon.
Repartir Exp. XY (en tu PC, puedes habilitarlo y deshabilitarlo).
MTs infinitas.
Objetos ocultos en rutas y casas.
División Físico/Especial/Estado.
Sistema EVs/IVs visible en el Centro Pokémon.

Devs:Stone Team

title: Pokemon Let's Go Lugia
genre: Action | Adventure | Platform | GBA Video / PSP Video
description:
Pokémon Let's Go Lugia is a fan-made ROM hack of Pokémon FireRed that reimagines the Johto region with modern features and enhanced gameplay. Designed for the Game Boy Advance, this hack offers an exciting new storyline where players can choose to play as Ash (from Kalos) or May (from Hoenn), each with different legendary Pokémon encounters and a fresh path through Johto.

The game blends elements from Generations I and II with features from later titles, such as overworld Pokémon, reusable TMs, a physical/special split, and EXP sharing for the whole team. Players can explore updated towns and routes, encounter hidden items, hatch surprise eggs, and battle Team Rocket in a reinvigorated side plot.

With improved visuals, a streamlined interface, and a balanced difficulty curve, Let's Go Lugia offers both nostalgia and innovation for Pokémon fans looking for a fresh experience in a familiar setting.

title: Pokémon Let's Go Pikachu GBA
description: Este juego está basado en el Pokémon Let's Go Pikachu de la versión de Nintendo Switch. Esto es un demake del mismo, realizado en base Fire Red por Kevin PokeFan.

title: Pokemon Life Version
description:
Yours is not an average, simple story; yours is a story spanning many dimensions of reality, exploring the very idea of life itself.
Generally, you consider your concepts of reality to be accurate…
They’re not. Reality is unstable.
All you really know is that time is running and the Earth is spinning.
You are one in seven billion like you, but you are still different.
On your island, Nendios, you dream the same dream that all young trainers like yourself do — to triumph over the Elite Four, conquering independence…

But there’s more to the journey ahead than you could ever know.
Again, there are seven billion like you — unfortunately, however, only a handful are as pure.
Many will try to manipulate you and anyone similarly pure; to use you to their own ends or even to simply impede your progress out of envy.
You must take heed of this. Life, the world, and the people within — they are all unpredictable, despite what some may think.
Certainly, stride forth — just be cautious.

title: Pokémon Light Platinum
alternate_titles: Pokemon Light Platinum | Pokemon Light Platinum Version
description: You wake up in a mysterious place and witness a fight between Arceus, Dialga, Palkia, and Giratina. “It must be a nightmare,” you think. Where are you and what is going on? When the dream ends, you appear to be in your house but you get a message that the Professor needs your help. Only you know the secret language of Alpha, a language passed down by your father. It is the only key to solving the problem. Did that dream have any effect on your world? Get a Pokémon, travel across the world, and save it before it’s too late!

title: Pokémon Light Platinum
description:
Set in the Zhery Region, Pokemon Light Platinum follows the journey of a young trainer who dreams of becoming the region's Champion. Along the way, players will encounter Team Steam, a nefarious organization with plans to control legendary Pokemon and dominate the region. With the help of Professor Jasmine and other allies, players must thwart Team Steam's plans while collecting badges and strengthening their team.

Pokemon Light Platinum offers an exciting and immersive experience for fans of the Pokemon series. With its engaging storyline, diverse selection of Pokemon, and unique features like Mega Evolution, it's no wonder this game has become a favorite among players. Whether you're a seasoned trainer or new to the world of Pokemon, Pokemon Light Platinum provides hours of entertainment and adventure. So grab your Pokeballs and get ready to embark on an epic journey through the Zhery Region!

title: Pokémon Liquid Crystal
description: Pokémon Liquid Crystal is a Fire Red Hack Rom based on Pokémon Crystal.

title: Pokémon Liquid Crystal Version HD
genre:
Pokémon Liquid Crystal is a Fire Red Hack Rom based on Pokémon Crystal.

ESRB Rating: Not Rated

title: Pokemon Lucid
description: Pokémon Lucid is a difficulty hack of Emerald, built using the Emerald expansion engine to bring all Pokémon into Gen 3. The game features tough opponents, enhanced AI, and a variety of modern mechanics and quality-of-life improvements for a fresh gameplay experience.

title: Pokémon Lugia's Ocean
description: My granddad used to travel out of our home country a lot. One trip his work sent him to Korea, and he came back with two bootlegs! (The other being Bluesea edition, which I’ll add after this one).They’re super interesting; they have Sinnoh region Pokémon but are on GBA carts, and I think are running off of Firered/Leafgreen ROMs, sometimes the music won’t even work, dialogue is whacky (due to rough translation, I assume) and even then, half the dialogue is in Spanish! They’re playable—but only barely. Mostly it’s just fun to boot up now and then to poke around in the overworld.

title: Pokemon Magical Altering Gym Menagerie
description: Welcome to Pokemon Magical Altering Gym Menagerie! Or MAGM for short. This is a yet-to-be-approved-by-the-Pokémon-League Gym challenge that should test your wits and your skills! The goal of this Gym is to collect 8 pins to earn the right to challenge the Gym Leader, Sothoth. Note that while there are more than 8 pins available, it is not mandatory to collect them all. I highly encourage you to talk to Sothoth whenever you’re unsure of what to do next. She has a lot of helpful and contextual dialogue and will comment on many, many different things from your progress and accomplishments to hints on what you need to do next. Just keep in mind the waiver you sign when you get started, MAGM inc. is not responsible for injuries, displacement, lost items, persons, dimensions, or sudden dimensional implosions.

title: Pokémon Master FireRed
alternate_titles: pokémon master firered | pokemon master firered | Pokemon Master FireRed
description:
Pokemon Master Fire Red is a GBA ROM Hack by MasterPoucine based on Pokemon Fire Red in English

 Insanity Difficulty Hack of FireRED with all 151 Pokemon Catchable before the Elite 4 (Even Mewtwo and Mew)

title: Pokémon Mega Delta
description: Pokémon Mega Delta es un hack rom NDS Completo en Español creado por Sir Rualy con MegaEvoluciones, Nueva historia y formas alola. Contaremos con numerosas mejoras de vida, además de algunos pokémon especiales como Greninja Ash.

title: Pokemon Mega Hoenn Adventures
description:
Pokemon Mega Hoenn Adventures is a modified version of Pokemon Hoenn Adventures but with many new features. The game has been made possible thanks to the verserkrdark team, who have worked to improve the experience of the previous version of the game.

Improvements include - 
Mega Evolutions in battle.
Pokémon from Generation 1 to Generation 7.
2440 Pokémon available.
RandomLocke, Hardmode, ShinyLocke, EeveeLocke, StarterLocke... mode.
New Megas included.

Mega Hoenn Adventures is a remastering of Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire with a series of new features such as graphical improvements, division of physical and special attacks, sprite improvements, among many other things. This ROMHack is a remastering of Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire so, as would be logical, it has the same story as these installments; however, this HackROM brings some changed details to make this game a totally different experience.

title: Pokemon Mega Light Platinum
description:
Pokemon Mega Light Platinum is a modded version of the original Pokemon Light Platinum by WeslyFG. This version adds Out of Battle Mega Evolution & Harder Puzzles to the game!

Features
New Regions – Zhery and Lauren
Mega Evolution (Out of Battle – Reversible)
New Gym Leaders and Elite Four
New Rivals
Pokemon from Johto, Kanto, Hoenn, Sinnoh and Unova
All Legendary Pokemon
New sprites and tiles
New final event- Pokemon World Championship
Harder Puzzles

title: Pokemon Mega Power
description: Neil/Tyra, the genius scientist who became a professor. He/she has a dream. He/she want to make the strongest Pokemon by himself, he did so many experiments. However, he/she doesn't have enough money. At this time, a business man called Kasper tells the young professor that he would contribute for the project, but the Professor must share the achievement with him. To reach his/her goal, he/she accepted Kasper's contribution without hesitating. As the young genius gradually know that Kasper is the leader of a secret team called "Team Delta", he/she begins to think about whether he/she should keep up. Why Kasper needs the project? What will he do? The young professor must make a decision, keep it up, or not?

title: Pokémon Memories
description: Un joven entrenador empieza un vieja con el sueño de convertirse en maestro Pokémon. Por el camino, se topará una vasta y nueva región que incluye los Pokémon que conocemos hasta hoy en día, venidos de todas las demás regiones. Además, también podremos encontrar flores temporales, que servirán para combatir contra entrenadores de la saga.

title: Pokemon Mirage Of Tales
description:
Avlar is a peaceful country with a rich history, famed for its vast woodlands, rolling hills and towering mountains. You play the role of an orphaned eighteen year old who was lucky enough to gain a scholarship at the Pokémon Trainer Academy in Umber Valley, a quaint little town situated in what's known as the Ore District.

The day of your graduation comes, and it's time for you sit your final exam, get a job and go out into the big wide world with your Pokémon by your side. Which profession will you choose? What kind of person will you become? It's all up to you. Every decision you make has the potential to change the course of your experience.

title: Pokemon Modern Emerald
description:
Pokemon Modern Emerald is a GBA Rom Hack by resetes12 based on  Pokemon Emerald in English.

Simply put, “Pokémon Modern Emerald” is a modernized edition of the original “Pokémon Emerald” game. This game includes all of the QOL features and improvements that I’ve been looking for since I first played the original game in 2005. Consider this a 2.0 update for the original game. This game is not and will never be a “difficulty hack-rom”. If you want a super difficult version of Pokémon Emerald, there are plenty of good hack-roms available. The idea behind this game is to play it instead of the original “Pokémon Emerald”, especially for those who want a vanilla experience with more features: simple difficulty modes, move splits, QOL features, new Pokémon, new areas, new rematches, and a large, etc.

This hack is a “3rd generation hack,” which means that it does not attempt to mimic later generations. While some features and improvements from later generations are included, this hack is fundamentally a 3rd generation game. Don’t expect to be able to catch all 900 different Pokémon or learn all of the new moves from later generations. This hack does not include the “Battle Engine Upgrade” or anything similar, but it does include some of its mechanics (such as the optional Physical / Special split that occurred in Generation IV or the Fairy Type). There are 423 Pokémon, with two from Generation 8 and three from Generation 9.

In addition, the game is incredibly modular. When you start a new game, a menu that contains dozens of options to customize your experience will appear.

title: Pokemon Moon Emerald
description: Pokemon Moon Emerald is a GBA Rom Hack based on Pokemon Emerald. The story is the same as Pokémon Emerald with several Pokémon from 7th Gen and Alola Forms added.

title: Pokemon Moon Galaxy
description: Pokemon Sun Sky and Moon Galaxy are GBA ROM hacks based on Pokemon Sun and Moon, Created by Ishrak’s PokeTips & Gohan’s Tips. It is about 15 years after the story of Pokémon Trainer Red. Red’s son lives in Pallet Town in the Kanto Region. But Red disappeared somewhere [However Red actually doesn’t play that much role in the game]. The protagonist of the game starts his journey when many things are totally changed in Kanto. After Professor Oak, Brock takes his place as the Pokémon Professor. The protagonist encounters some Pokémon which is not in the Kanto Pokedex. Eventually, he travels through Alola Region! But the main game takes its place in Kanto.

title: Pokémon Mugiwara
alternate_titles: Pokemon Mugiwara | pokemon mugiwara | pokémon mugiwara
description:
Pokemon Mugiwara is a GBA Rom Hack by Ryuko72 based on Pokemon Fire Red. And it is now available to download. It was last updated on October 1, 2023.

Setting your sights on becoming the King of the Pirates, you embark from Villa Foosha into uncharted waters. After sailing a few leagues, your ship falls under attack by the infamous vessel, Miss Love. Navigating through several challenges, you successfully assemble the essential crew to kickstart your grand adventure. Rumors circulate about a mysterious expanse known as the “Grand Line,” rumored to safeguard a concealed treasure. Whoever lays claim to this treasure shall be revered as the undisputed Pirate King!

title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of the Spirit
description:
What is the spirit?
Experience a new, full-length story about our familiar comforts and uncomfortable changes.
Features newly redesigned dungeons, an expansive cast of characters, unique dungeon design that simultaneously encourages freedom of playstyle plus pushes for creative strategy, and about a million other things that we don't want to spoil.

title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
description: Who are you? Why, you're a pokémon! A new life awaits you, and with your partner by your side, you'll live it to the fullest! Help other pokémon in a rescue team all your own, make friends, and develop memories as you journey. Although dangers lie ahead, helping others will always pay off, and your team is ready to do whatever it takes. Let's go!

title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team (jp)
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokémon Mystical
description:
En la region Kiuw el prof Oak te da a un Pokémon para que empieces tu viaje para detener la guerra de Kerzal contra DEOXYS, para ello deberas de capturar a los 3 pokemons místicos para poder viajar al espacio y pelear contra Deoxys...
Para poder llegar al centro espacial debes tener completos los gimnasios...

title: Pokemon Nameless Version
description:
This is the prequel(and sequel, but the sequel part just consists of several events.) of Pokemon Mega Power and the sequel of Pokemon Resolute. In this game, you play as Chronya, the young hero of Cyenn Region.

Story:
12 years ago, Altena, the general of Valo Empire had to leave her country with her daughter Chronya. She didn't tell Chronya why they had to leave their hometown. The only thing Chronya knew was that she had a father who lived in Cyenn Region, and her mother decided to ask for his father's help. However, they were attacked by Dark Workers, who were employed by the Valo Emperor. The emperor wanted to get rid of Altena forever. Altena fell into Dark Worker's trap, Chronya had no choice, she had to jump into the ocean. She was saved by a young agent, this agent was called Gavin. To defend Chronya, Gavin gave Chronya his Pokemon. This is the beginning of Chronya's journey...

Features:
New region -- Cyenn Region, Western Tyron Region, Sevii Island and Lande Region.
Pokemon from generation 4 to generation 8.
Real Mega Evolution -- Except for Chronya's first Pokemon, it's special.
No Gyms -- Battle Arenas take the place of the Gyms.
No Pokemon League in Cyenn Region -- The tournament takes the place of the Cyenn League.
You can decide on when to challenge the Cyenn Tournament by yourself.
Skills take the place of HMs, try to learn more useful skills.
Half open world(After the Shedir Town event).
You can decide on when to begin with the main storyline by yourself.
Black/White Repel System.

title: Pokemon Naranja
description: Pokemon Naranja is one of the coolest Pokemon hacks, exploring the Orange Islands. Go on an adventure and meet Brock, Misty, Tracey, Ash, Prof Oak and many others just like the anime series.

title: Pokemon National History Museum
alternate_titles: Pokemon - National History Museum (v1.0.4) (wiz1989) | Pokemon - National History Museum (v1.0.4) (wiz1989)
description:
CAN YOU MAKE IT OUTTA HERE?
Do you have what it takes to make it past the superior trainers, come up with original strategies, and progress through this challenge on your own?

Or will you be beaten countless times, crawling back to the Game Master, begging him for hints?

It’s all up to you, your skill and determination! There’s no mercy for the unskilled and uninspired

title: Pokemon Odyssey
alternate_titles: Pokemon Odyssey (v3.5.4) (PacoScarso) | Pokemon Odyssey (v4.0) (PacoScarso) | Pokemon Odyssey v4.1
description:
Pokémon Odyssey is a FireRed ROM hack that immerses players in a gripping, dungeon-crawling adventure set on the enigmatic Talrega Island. Here, the legendary Yggdrasil Labyrinth draws adventurers from across the globe, each seeking wealth, fame, or the thrill of testing their skills against the maze's formidable challenges. You play as Nyx, a young and ambitious explorer who descends into the labyrinth, only for things to quickly take a mysterious and perilous turn, unraveling a story that pushes her to uncover what truly lies at the heart of Yggdrasil.

Blending classic Pokémon gameplay with deep narrative intrigue, Pokémon Odyssey invites players to uncover hidden secrets, navigate dangerous twists, and pursue answers to the labyrinth's central mystery, all while embracing a fresh take on the series' traditional quest structure.

title: Pokemon Omega Origins
description:
Pokemon Omega Origins is a Pokemon GBA Rom Hack by Lautaro Sánchez based on Pokemon FireRed in English. And It is now available to download. It was last updated in October 2019.

Features.
NDS Style Graphics
Physical/Special Split
Reusable TMs
Fairy Type Added
Ext XY Repeater
Ash Greninja
Pokemon from Generation 1 to 7
Randomized Pokemon

title: Pokémon Omega Red (Español)
description:
Misma historia, pero mejorada en todos los sentidos, como se puede comprobar.

Características:
Gráficos cambiados.
Mecánicas vitales actualizadas (repelente, deportivas, MOs olvidables...)
Todos los Pokémon (807), formas Alola y Megaevoluciones.
Mini Sprites (OverWorlds) estilo DS.
División de categorías Física, Especial y Estado de los ataques.
Iconos y Sprites de los Pokemon actualizados.
Sistema de Día y Noche.
Repartir Experiencia X/Y.
Nuevos objetos.
Nuevas Piedras Evolutivas.
Anillos Hoopa.
Todos los Pokémon obtenibles.
Nuevas MT (TM).
Gritos Originales de los nuevos Pokémon.
Nuevas Zonas (en Kanto y las Islas) donde estarán los Pokemon Legendarios.
Roca Ombligo/Isla Origen disponible sin Código/Ticket.
Más/mejores Objetos en las tiendas.
Dificultad de entrenadores aumentada.
Algunas Midis cambiadas.

Dev:Jolt

title: Pokemon Onyx
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokémon Orange Islands
alternate_titles: Pokemon Orange Islands | Pokemon - Orange Islands (Beta) (v5.7) (kalarie)
description: You will play as Ash Ketchum from Pallet Town! Just after Ash conquered the Indigo League he got back to his mom in his hometown where Professor Oak also has a new objective for him. He wants Ash to go to Valencia Island to pick up a strange kind of Pokeball for him, since Professor Ivy is unable to send it to him through the PC system. Of course Ash is eager to take this easy objective. What happens after this is, of course, already known to you because we all saw the anime.

title: Pokemon Order and Chaos
description:
War, famine, and disease plagued the early settlers of the Mando territories as the God Dragon Chaosotra tormented the land. Eventually, the greater Dragon of the People, Orderana, defeated the chaos demon and civilization grew.

Year 0 -A prophecy is made stating that if the region falls to chaos once more, a chosen 15-year-old with his province’s surname shall rule and free the land from evil.

Year 500 -Mando split into the two areas from sectional differences and the death of the king. The two provinces became known as Mandata and Endo. Racism had emerged as a serious problem for generations. Usually, the strongest and most well-known man is crowned when a bloodline dies out, but no side wanted to give the other side power, there was no leader. War broke out and the people feared the legendary God Dragon of Chaos may have returned to punish them.


Year 515 -Afraid, they turn to the prophecy and know that there is a child with the respected surname in both provinces. The only problem is, that in both regions there are not one but two children of the same age and blood, twins. Only being able to select one hero to be crowned champion of the entire Mando region the twins must face off against one another. The better will be blessed and start his journey to prove he is the strongest by collecting badges and challenging the Frontier League. Once he is champion he will enslave the other province and be worshiped as a God.

You are one of the twins the prophecy spoke of and tomorrow you shall face your brother in a pokemon duel to decide who will represent the Endo province.

title: Pokemon Outlaw
description:
Pokemon Outlaw is not like most of the hacks here. This not a story of some brand new region with yet another 10 year old kid setting out the explore the world. (Do any of you guys feel that 10 years old is too young to go out by yourself in a world full of dangerous super-powered creatures?) Nor is this some story of some overpowered grunt of some criminal team.

This is the story of a 15 year old orphan who is homeless and resides in the slums. This is about his rise to greatness in the Pokemon world. The world in this game is one that should be familiar to most of you. It is Kanto, the world of Pokemon FireRed. There are some significant differences in the maps (new places and buildings) but it is definitely FireRed's Kanto.

title: Pokémon Parallel Emerald
alternate_titles: Pokemon Parallel Emerald v1.1.1 | Pokemon Parallel Emerald
description:
Have you ever wondered what Pokémon Emerald might look like in a parallel universe? Well, combined with modern day Pokémon ROM hack features that is exactly the idea of this Emerald ROM Hack. All maps in Hoenn have been redesigned, expanded or completely reworked. And you can expect completely new maps as well! Accompanied by these changes are different Gym Leaders, Rivals and Elite members at the Pokémon League to make this game feel like a truly different experience!

All trainers and encounters have been reworked with Pokémon from all 8 Generations (Hisui included). Battle mechanics are updated to Generation 8. And of course, there will also be many of the QOL features you know and love from modern Pokémon games or other ROM hacks.

title: Pokemon Perfect FireRed
alternate_titles: Pokémon Perfect FireRed | pokemon perfect firered | pokémon perfect firered
description:
Pokemon Perfect Fire Red is a GBA ROM Hack by DarthBR & CreamELDudJafar based on Pokemon Fire Red in English. 

An improvement-type hack of Fire Red with the original story, and quality of life changes.

title: Pokemon Perfect LeafGreen
alternate_titles: Pokémon Perfect LeafGreen | pokemon perfect leafgreen | pokémon perfect leafgreen
description:
Pokemon Perfect Leaf Green is a GBA ROM Hack by DarthBR & CreamELDudJafar based on Pokemon Leaf Green in English. 

An improvement-type hack of Leaf Green with the original story, and quality of life changes.

title: Pokemon Perfect WaterBlue
alternate_titles: pokemon perfect waterblue | Pokémon Perfect WaterBlue | pokémon perfect waterblue
description:
Pokemon Perfect Water Blue is a GBA ROM Hack by DarthBR & CreamELDudJafar based on Pokemon Fire Red in English. 

An improvement-type hack of Fire Red with the original story, and quality of life changes.

title: Pokémon Pesadilla
description: La historia trata de una famosa creepypasta de Hypno y Pedrita, sí la famosa escena del bosque de Isla Tera que se ve en Pokémon Verde Hoja y Rojo fuego.

title: Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
description:
Combine the non-stop action of a pinball game with the thrill of catching Pokémon! In Pokémon Pinball: Ruby and Sapphire, control the flippers to shoot the Poké Ball at themed targets on two challenging tables based on Pokémon Ruby and Pokémon Sapphire.

Rack up as many points as possible as you try to catch more than 200 Pokémon, featuring your favourite characters from the classic Hoenn Pokédex. There are bonus stages to enjoy, and Pokémon can even evolve. Pokémon Pinball is packed full of references that fans will flip out over!

title: Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire
description: Pokemon Pinball has all the features you'd demand of a pinball game, including bonus tables, lots of bumpers and ways to score massive points. As with your standard videogame pinball game, the left button on the D-pad and the A-button control the flippers with the R/L triggers used to shake the table. The catch here is that everything is themed in Pokemon. Instead of a ball, you make use of a Pokeball. Instead of standard bumpers, you're hitting the Pokeball against other Pokemon, and the ultimate goal is of course to "catch 'em all". The game features 200 Pokemon, two main tables, and link cable support.

title: Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire
alternate_titles: Pokémon Pinball Ruby & Sapphire | Pokémon Pinball Ruby and Sapphire
description: Pokemon Pinball has all the features you'd demand of a pinball game, including bonus tables, lots of bumpers and ways to score massive points. As with your standard videogame pinball game, the left button on the D-pad and the A-button control the flippers with the R/L triggers used to shake the table. The catch here is that everything is themed in Pokemon. Instead of a ball, you make use of a Pokeball. Instead of standard bumpers, you're hitting the Pokeball against other Pokemon, and the ultimate goal is of course to "catch 'em all". The game features 200 Pokemon, two main tables, and link cable support.

title: Pokémon Pisces
description: Pokémon Pisces is a bold reimagining of Pokémon Emerald, offering a fresh and immersive journey through a completely remapped Hoenn. Built as an Emerald decompilation project, this ROM hack introduces a brand-new storyline, over 200 original Fakemon, new abilities, new types, and a host of exciting features that breathe new life into the adventure.

title: Pokemon Pit Of 100 Trials
description:
This hack expands on the concept introduced in Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, in which there is a challenge area (The pit of 100 trials). There, you must battle 100 different enemies that appear throughout the game, each with increasing difficulty, and there is a super boss and a reward at the end.

In this hack, you can easily create any Pokemon team you want, EV train them almost instantly, and battle 100 battles that represent the progression throughout Fire Red. For example, you begin by battling Bug Catchers, then Youngsters, Brock, Rocket Grunts in Mt. Moon, Nugget Bridge trainers, and so on.

Of course these trainers are only the same by the type of Pokemon they use. Their Pokemon are all level 100 and can be from any Generation from 1-3.

You fight these types of trainers until you reach a certain point. The final ten trainers are all a little more unique.

title: Pokemon Psychic Adventures
alternate_titles: Pokémon Psychic Adventures | pokemon psychic adventures | pokémon psychic adventures
description:
Pokemon Psychic Adventures is a GBA Rom Hack by EViLGRiN based on Pokemon Fire Red in English.

Not at all, you have to think about it again if you are going to play this game. In fact, it can be rated as a 16+ Pokemon hack (maybe the first and the only one ever). You will understand why, soon.

Instead of having a basic starter like Bulbasaur – Squirtle – Charmander like any other Pokemon hack… you will get a Drowzee (a Pokemon which is specialized in hypnotizing anyone it meets). As you progress further in-game, you will level up your Drowzee and use its special Psychic power to control the girls you meet. There are many choices for you to do after controlling them, usually, they are more than 18 choices. Hmm, not only doing that but you also have to get the badges and the Champion title as usual.

title: Pokémon Quartz Version
description: You live in a small town called Saffron in Corna Region and are a young trainer. Professor Baro Lab is near your house. One day, you have to move to the breeze town and Professor wants you and your friend Ran/J.Akira to catch all Pokemon in this region. SO your adventure now begins. You will meet a lot of new people, must defeat GYM Leaders, the rivals and earn money to continue your journey. Finally, you realize that you must save your world from the Evil Team.

title: Pokémon Quetzal
alternate_titles: Pokémon Edición Quetzal v. 0.7. | Pokémon Emerald Multiplayer
description:
Pokemon Quetzal is a Completed GBA Rom Hack made by TenmaRH. Enjoy Pokemon Emerald like never before with 44 starter options, multiple characters to choose from, Pokemon from all generations, Mega Evolutions, Gigantamax forms, Z-Moves, and much more.

Pokemon Quetzal is a fan-made Pokémon ROM hack that merges elements from the classic Pokemon Emerald with new features and enhancements. It offers a refreshed experience of the Hoenn region, with added content such as a wider variety of Pokémon from different generations, custom events, and updated graphics.

The game maintains the original storyline while incorporating improved mechanics, including updated battle systems and quality-of-life changes that make gameplay more enjoyable for both newcomers and veteran trainers. Pokemon Quetzal promises a nostalgic yet novel adventure for all Pokemon enthusiasts.

FEATURES
Almost all pokemon from Generation 1 to 9 including DLC Pokemon.
Alolan, Galarian, Hisuian, Primal and Paradox Forms.
Multiplayer Mode.
44 starter option to choose from.
You can choose the number of pokemon that can follow you (1-6)
Almost Every Characters Are Available To Choose as Protagonist [Red, Ash, May, Brendan, Dawn, Lucas, Steven Etc]
Eternamax Eternatus
Dexnav
Dynamax and Gigantamax
Mega Evolution
Z Moves
Ultra Beasts
Easily Trade Pokemon
PC Is Excessable Anywhere AnyTime
You can ride on any pokemon
Use HMs outside battle without having to learn them
Customizable shiny rate
Special battle with popular trainers for special rewards
Almost all legendary pokemon are catchable
Individual, double, and multiple combats against other players from anywhere
Battle in co-op mode (battle together against the other trainers in double battles)
Spectator mode: you can watch the game with other players (and fight alongside them)

title: Pokémon R.O.W.E.
alternate_titles: Pokémon R.O.W.E. Version | Pokémon ROWE | Pokemon ROWE | Pokemon ROWE v2.0.4.1
description: Pokemon R.O.W.E reimagines the Pokemon Emerald experience, offering an open-world adventure with quality-of-life enhancements and diverse team building. Features include non-linear exploration, Gen 8 Pokemon, and numerous quality-of-life improvements for team building. Players choose from nine starters or opt for a random selection, exploring three difficulty levels. Regional music options, randomized mode, double battle mode, and other dynamic features add depth. The game eliminates HMs, introduces daily gym leader rematches, and implements level scaling based on badges. Mega evolutions, reusable TMs, and the DexNav for rare Pokemon enrich the experience. Kemon R.O.W.E incorporates features from various generations, such as Gen 8 Flying Taxis and the Gen 7 Daycare System, creating a captivating and innovative Pokemon adventure.

title: Pokémon Radical Red Version
alternate_titles: Pokemon Radical Red | Radical Red | Pokemon Radical Red v4.0
description: This hack is at its core a difficulty hack with additional features; quite similar to Drayano60's enhancement hacks, which provide access to nearly all the Pokémon while also adding relevant buffs.

title: Pokémon RadicalRed Version
description:
Hack and Description by soupercell

I've been playing Pokémon ROM hacks since I was a kid, starting with Quartz, Ruby Destiny Reign of Legends, and Shiny Gold, all of which helped spiral my obsession, making me a long-time lurker in the community. Although I have made attempts to make one myself, I simply lacked the knowledge or dedication to make anything happen. Now, around 10-12 years later, seeing how far ROM hacking has advanced and with more confidence in my skills, I've decided to revisit developing my own ROM hack.

Fire Red enhancement hacks are definitely a dime a dozen these days, so you're probably wondering what this hack has to offer. I personally enjoy difficulty hacks the most, which is why I consider ROM hacks like Clover and Vega to be the two best ones out there.

This hack is at its core a difficulty hack, but with massive additional features added to help you navigate through this game's difficulty.
If I had to draw a comparison it'd be quite similar to Drayano60's enhancement hacks, which provide access to nearly all the Pokemon while also adding relevant buffs to make all sorts of different Pokémon and playstyles viable, but with an insane amount of quality of life features added that also make many gruesome tasks far less tedious.

This is a joint project with me and a friend koala4; although I've handled pretty much everything on the technical side he's assisted me immensely in balancing, giving suggestions, doing the wild Pokemon locations for the most part, testing, and more.

title: Pokemon RE:Verse
description: This is a rom-hack, based from Pokemon Fire Red, my objective for this romhack is to offer a reimagined rendition of the original Fire Red, providing players with a refreshing and immersive gameplay experience. By preserving the essence of Fire Red, RE:Verse retains familiar locations such as Palet and Viridian, albeit with altered positions and pathways that inject novelty into the gameplay.

title: Pokémon Reboot
description: A rom hack based on the artwork of pkmnreboot (@maumesart and @ikki382), this overhaul reinvigorates the old Pokémon through a modern lens. Created by yogur.comics.

title: Pokemon Recharged Emerald
alternate_titles: Pokèmon Recharged Emerald | Pokèmon - Recharged Emerald | Pokemon Recharged Emerald
description: Pokemon Recharged Emerald is an enhanced version of the original Pokémon Emerald featuring extensive engine upgrades, graphical improvements, and numerous Pokémon changes. It also introduces many quality-of-life features and offers various difficulty options, including a built-in Nuzlocke mode.

title: Pokémon Recharged Emerald
description:
Pokémon Recharged Emerald is romhack of the original Pokémon Emerald made by Jaizu featuring extensive engine upgrades, graphical improvements, and numerous Pokémon changes. It also introduces many quality-of-life features and offers various difficulty options, including a built-in Nuzlocke mode.

Engine changes:
    Key item wheel to register 4 items at the same time.
    Trainers have more options now, so certain trainers can have EVS, better IV distribution for stuff like Hidden Power and even some trainers can name their Pokémon or have shinies!
    Smart re-usable Repel and Lure system
    Added a system that prevents giving non gen 3 items to Pokémon, which allows having new items like nature mints and bottle caps.
    Switch between Pokémon by pressing SELECT in the Party Menu.
    Battle moves will show its type GFX and special/physical category when selecting them.
    You can press START in battle to show info of the selected move, like its description and power.
    You can run in Pacifidlog Town
    Starter PID will get generated while the Birch’s bag UI gets loaded. You will be able to see if a starter is shiny before selecting it.
    The wall clock will show you the selected time before setting up the time for the first time.
    Tutorial Battle Ralts Can’t Be Shiny or Knocked Out
    Added an NPC that will tell you which Hidden Power your Pokémon has. ||NPC inside a house in Sootopolis city.
    Gym leaders will be daily rematchable instead a random percentage of it after each battle.
    Repeated Field Medicine Use
    Faster pre-battle intros
    Faster battle slide animation
    Message when a Pokémon picks up an item.
    You can swap items between Pokémon in the party menu.
    [Some implemented] Reusable move-tutors
    Better money loss when losing a battle, now you don’t lose half your money
    Birch intro fade in happens faster
    Modernized font a tiny bit
    Birch can be chased by different Pokémon

title: Pokémon Recharged Emerald - Rebalanced Version
description:
Pokémon Recharged Emerald is romhack of the original Pokémon Emerald made by Jaizu featuring extensive engine upgrades, graphical improvements, and numerous Pokémon changes. It also introduces many quality-of-life features and offers various difficulty options, including a built-in Nuzlocke mode.

title: Pokémon Recharged Pink
alternate_titles: Pokemon Recharged Pink | Pokemon - Recharged Pink (v1.6.5) (Jaizu)
description:
Pokémon Recharged Pink is a variation of Pokemon Recharged Yellow (a hack rom made by Jaizu), tailored for players who don’t require compatibility with Generation 3 games. This version removes connection features and includes a cheat menu accessible through the Player’s computer. For a detailed list of changes, see below.

Changes vs. Pokemon Recharged Yellow
    Clefairy is your starter Pokémon.
    The Pokédex features a pink UI.
    Save files are not compatible between the two.
    No ability to connect to other games.
    No game label in the Pokémon summary screen.
    A cheat menu in the Player’s computer allows access to items, Pokémon, and editing IVs/EVs.
    The default textbox color is pink instead of blue.
    Battle UI now features a pink/purple textbox instead of an orange one.
    Pikachu can be caught in the Viridian Forest.
    Changes to the battle engine
    Ghost-type is now Special & Dark-type and Dragon-type are now Physical.
    Some trainers have modified movesets to align with the type changes.

title: Pokémon Recharged Yellow
alternate_titles: Pokemon Emerald Version (USA, Europe) + 1.4 Patch | Pokemon - Recharged Yellow (v1.6.1) (Jaizu) | Pokemon - Recharged Yellow (v1.8.0) (Jaizu)
description:
Relive Kanto in a refreshed adventure with the pure style of gen 3!
Plenty of quality of changes, built-in modes, Jessie and James and much more!

Features

Pikachu as Starter
Following Pokemon System
Fully compatible with vanilla gen 3 games and Pokemon Heliodor!
Kanto rebuilt in Pokemon Emerald engine, this includes RTC, berries, contests and post-game facilities.
Pokemon color variation from Pokemon stadium, this is reflected in the followers, party menu and pc boxes!
Richer Pokemon icons, this reflects the PID of your Pokemon and if they are shiny
Lots of quality of life features
Built in hard mode, nuzlocke mode and level cap
Lots of touches from Let’s Go Pikachu, including Jessie and James.
Sevii Islands are locked to post-game, they all have new and revamped content
And lots of more stuff!

title: Pokemon Regis’ Origin
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokémon Regis' Origin
alternate_titles: Pokemon Regis Origin | Pokemon Regis' Origin | Pokemon - Regis Origin
description:
Pasados 5 años desde que Brendan/May obtuvo el título de Campeon@ de la Liga, todo parece estar en paz... Pero una sombra se alza de nuevo con más fuerza sobre Hoenn... Tras la intervención de Rayquaza, las anomalías climatológicas parecían haber cesado. Pero por un motivo incierto, esas anomalías están reapareciendo cada vez con más frecuencia...

Magno y Aquiles entendieron el valor del equilibrio entre la Tierra y el Mar. Sus frías ambiciones se convirtieron en su vergüenza y con ello, ambos desaparecieron... Sin embargo, estos dos antiguos rivales seguirán manteniendo la vista fija en Hoenn, observando todo lo que ocurre... E incluso, llegarán a rearmar a sus aún fieles...

Debido a las drásticas alteraciones meteorológicas, Devon formará un departamento de investigación, siendo Máximo uno de sus miembros. Tras un terrible incidente, él y Plubio tendrán un presentimiento tan malo, que no dudarán en pedir ayuda a nuestr@ protagonista.

title: Pokemon Resolute
description: This hack is about a trainer(Logan/Alm) who lives in Cedar City of Sylon. One day, Professor Avery orders you to come to his lab. While getting there, you find that Team Mirage, the organization which broke down 1 year ago in Tyron is trying to make a comeback, and they declare that they'll start a "reform". What's the meaning of the "reform"? The trainer will travel all over the Sylon and finally get the answer...

title: Pokemon Rijon Adventures
description: Rijon Adventures is a hack of Pokémon FireRed, developed by Haruki Hanai and coordinated by Koolboyman. It takes place in Rijon, 20 years after Pokémon Brown.

title: Pokémon rijonAdventures
description: Rijon Adventures is a hack of Pokémon FireRed, developed by Haruki Hanai and coordinated by Koolboyman. It takes place in Rijon, 20 years after Pokémon Brown. The game is similar to Pokémon FireRed, except that the player takes control of Brown's child and not Brown himself, Prof. Oak is replaced by the aunt of the player's rival, probably Mura's sister/cousin.

title: Pokemon Ruby Destiny: Life of Guardians
description:
In the altered world where Team Go-Getters accidentally created lives a young girl who always dreamed tobe a Guardian Trainer after she heard all about it, even though she has no idea how to be come one, but still, she's determined to achieve her goal to be a Guardian Trainer.
One day, she can no longer stay home, for she wants to achieve her goal, and so she went out to try and befriend a Pokemon so she can travel the region and learn about Guardian Trainers. Unfortunately, she was stopped by her childhood friend, Kevin, and when they decided to go back home, a shaman was running for her dear life. She was chased by two members of the Dark Organization, trying to steal her Pokemon.
Unsure of what to do, she asked both kids to choose one Pokemon from her and battle the grunts. Later, they successfully defeated the grunts, which then fled. To thank them, she gave them the Pokemon they used as a reward.
And now that she has a Pokemon with her side, she will finally be able to start her own journey to achieve her goal to be a Guardian Trainer, But the region's been chaotic since the rise of the Dark Organization. Trials await her in the future, and a strange dream's confusing her. Will she be able to achieve her goal, or will she drive her destiny into the wrong path of life?

title: Pokemon Ruby Destiny: Reign of Legends
description:
Your brother has called upon you and your mother to live in the region where he is the Gym Leader of Snow Soft City in the region of GENTO. There, you arrived and decided to live in Sun Ford Town, where you'll get your first POKEMON to begin your very own journey.
Try and stop the evil plots of the two evil gangs, Luminous Cenaries, who's vision is to overcast the world with sunlight, and ROYAL DARKNESS, which tries to shade the world with darkness...
But time won't tell what's in store for you in the future. You'll be embarked on a journey to save the world from XD001, or better known as Shadow Lugia.
You'll meet several POKEMON that will help you stop the key of destruction. Are you ready to face the reality of the future..? Only time will tell.

title: Pokemon Ruby Destiny: Rescue Rangers
description:
You're just a simple and average kid living in the real world. The day has come, yes! It's your 12th birthday. To celebrate it, you invited 4 of your friends who, like you, loves POKéMON as well. But then, when you were about to begin, a strange aura came in the room and made you loose your consciousness.
Once you woke up, you found yourself deep in the forest which you aren't familiar with, and then you heard strange cries of animals. You checked it out and to your surprise, you found a Torchic and a Chikorita for real, or, they found you.
A dream come true, or a nightmare? They told you that you're a POKéMON as well, a Pikachu! Shocked and confused, they offered you to join their Rescue Team. Having nowhere else to go, you agreed. And so your journey, as a new being, begins.

title: Pokémon Ruby Version
description:
Pokémon Ruby Version is a 2003 Game Boy Advance strategy role-playing video game developed by Game Freak and released by Nintendo of America in the USA on March 17, 2003.

The race to catch 'em all is on again in Pokémon Ruby. This entry in the Pokémon series features an all-new storyline, awesome new Pokémon, and addictive RPG gameplay. One of the biggest additions to Pokémon Ruby is the two-on-two battle system, which allows you to link up with three friends to battle competitively or cooperatively. You can also showcase your Pokémon's coolness, beauty, cuteness, smartness, and toughness in Pokémon contests. With new Pokémon, two-on-two battles, and an all-new region of Hoenn to explore, Pokémon Sapphire takes the Pokémon experience to the next level.

title: Pokémon Run & Bun
description:
Pokémon Run & Bun is at it's core a difficulty hack of Emerald, slightly inspired by games such as Emerald Kaizo and Radical Red, but offering a lot of new takes on ways to make battles interesting. Plenty of quality of life features will make sure you spend your time on the fun side of it instead of worrying about gruesome, tedious tasks.
The game features almost 500 battles, and all of them were designed with custom movesets and synergistic parties, making each trainer feel unique in it's own way within the world. You will not be stomping your way through battles here, you will simply be another trainer in the world, making your journey feel like an actual journey and not a slog.
Gym Leaders and Teams Aqua and Magma have been given extra attention and boss fights were added to complement the game. Each victory should feel rewarding.

title: Pokémon Saiph 2 - The VytroVerse Part 3
alternate_titles: Pokemon Saiph 2 (Vytron Final Release v1.3.2) | Pokemon Saiph 2
description:
The game takes place 3 years after the events of Pokémon Saiph and a few weeks after Pokémon Sors, however, it’s not too connected to the latter.

Micah along with Darlo, are returning from a formal event which Micah was invited to as Colen’s Champion and the Co-Leader of the world’s first ITP Group. (International Threat Prevention)

On the flight back, they get into a mysterious accident which results in the plane crashing. Micah and Darlo evacuate everyone, however, they themselves ended up being stranded in the faraway Regris Region! Micah is being treated by a Regrissian (The word used for someone from Regris just to be clear) girl and starts his mission to find Darlo, find a way to connect with Lori in Colen, and a way to return home… However, as always things aren’t as simple as that. Little does Micah know, that he is about to be involved in something even he hasn’t seen 3 years ago… (or Asher a few weeks ago for that matter).

title: Pokémon Sapphire Version
alternate_titles: ポケットモンスターサファイア
description: The race to catch 'em all is on again in Pokemon Sapphire. This entry in the Pokemon series features an all-new storyline, awesome new Pokemon, and addictive RPG gameplay. One of the biggest additions to Pokemon Sapphire is the two-on-two battle system, which allows you to link up with three friends to battle competitively or cooperatively. You can also showcase your Pokemon's coolness, beauty, cuteness, smartness, and toughness in Pokemon contests. With new Pokemon, two-on-two battles, and an all-new region of Hoenn to explore, Pokemon Sapphire takes the Pokemon experience to the next level.

title: Pokémon Sapphire Version
description:
Pokémon Sapphire Version is a 2003 Game Boy Advance strategy role-playing video game developed by Game Freak and released by Nintendo of America in the USA on March 17, 2003.

The race to catch 'em all is on again in Pokémon Sapphire. This entry in the Pokémon series features an all-new storyline, awesome new Pokémon, and addictive RPG gameplay. One of the biggest additions to Pokémon Sapphire is the two-on-two battle system, which allows you to link up with three friends to battle competitively or cooperatively. You can also showcase your Pokémon's coolness, beauty, cuteness, smartness, and toughness in Pokémon contests. With new Pokémon, two-on-two battles, and an all-new region of Hoenn to explore, Pokémon Sapphire takes the Pokémon experience to the next level.

title: Pokemon School Version
description: In Pokemon School, you’re a student and you’re going to study in the Primary Poke-School. Explore the school and discover all its secrets. Challenge other students/teachers/janitors and obtain good marks because you’ll need them to do the final exam.

title: Pokémon Scorched Silver
description: Set 20 years after the events of Gold and Silver, you’ll meet many new and old characters along your journey, as well as uncover more of the region’s secrets. Discover a wide variety of Pokémon and an all-new storyline as your path intertwines with a mysterious group calling themselves Team Phoenix, who seem determined to capture Celebi for some nefarious scheme.

title: Pokémon Shiny Gold Sigma
alternate_titles: Pokémon Gold | ポケットモンスター　金 | Pokémon Goldene Edition | Pokémon Version Or | Pokémon Versione Oro | Pokémon Edición Oro | 포켓몬스터 금
description:
Pokémon SGS is a revolutionary game that is a Pokémon Fire Red Version hack based on Pokémon Crystal Version.

Much as 1999's Pokémon Yellow offered gentle enhancements to the basic story and gameplay of the original Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue games, Pokémon Crystal, which this game is modeled after, is based on the second-wave Pokémon Gold and Pokémon Silver releases. Though it follows the same story told in the Gold and Silver versions, Pokémon Shiny Gold Sigma has some new options and special features. For the first time, gamers have the choice to play as a female trainer in this version. Also, just as Pokémon Yellow included a special Pikachu, trainers are aided by an unusual Suicune in this release. Pokémon Shiny Gold Sigma is designed to offer a complete Pokémon experience for those new to the ubiquitous phenomenon and additional challenges for seasoned trainers who simply have to catch 'em all.

title: Pokemon Shiron Castle
description: You are a delivery boy tasked with delivering an item to someone named Javier who lives in Daiman Village, a small, history-rich rural village within the region of Tauron. When reaching Javier’s house, you learn that he’s gone to the nearby castle located to the west of the village, as he felt that there was something wrong there, which prompts his mother to ask you to look for him as he’s been gone for a long time. Upon visiting the castle, you find yourself in the bustling “ancient battles fair”, a festivity which celebrates the region of Shiron’s transformation into modern day Tauron after the tyrant king Tasqui-Shiron fell and his monarch was demolished. The player faces many opponents within the castle, including channelers who try to contact the spirits of the castle to learn more about their history, and knight cosplayers who specialize in training steel-types. You will learn much more about the history of Shiron Castle, the history of Tauron, and the former alliances and enemies both within and outside the region. What happens next? Does the player find Javier in the castle? Well, I don’t want to spoil everything, so please enjoy this story-driven experience!

title: Pokemon Sienna Version
description: The day has finally come, the day for your era to begin. After months of waiting, you hear of an opening at the Indigo Plateau trainer school in Kanto. After sending off your letter, your CV is rejected. Mostly because of your lack of experience; but, your alternative is to go out on your own journey. Challenging the gyms, and finally the plateau, in Kanto, should be no problem. But, the region is being disturbed by the up-rising of a mysterious team. This ‘team’ have been going around the region and causing havoc, stealing Pokémon and mugging shops. Will you merge in with the group, let them be, or will you stop them on your journey? It’s all up to you!

title: Pokemon Sigma Emerald
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokémon Sirius
description:
After the events of Pokémon Emerald and the Hoenn Catastrophe, that happens 3 years before Altair and Sirius, the Hoenn region suffered a lot of changes not only in terrain but also in the habitat of its Pokémon, reflecting that are the changes that suffered the Pokédex. You will receive it from Professor Birch to investigate these changes.

It can be observed that even though some Pokémon that are native of Hoenn are still here, some dissapearances have been replaced by Pokémon native of regions like Kanto and the recently discovered (at the time) Sinnoh, alongside a large bunch of new Pokémon that are believed appeared because of the meteoric activity.

title: Pokémon SkyBlue
description: Pokemon Sky Blue is the story that narrates the journey of Adam, Sofía, and Nacho in search of the 5 fragments of the star. An odyssey that will not be easy for them, as they must visit the 25 forgotten worlds through the distorted world.

title: Pokemon Slowpink
description: Pokémon Slowpink is an enhanced version of the author’s (Jicem) first hack, Pokemon Enduring Emerald, designed as a nostalgic callback to Pokémon Yellow and Pokémon: Let’s Go, Pikachu & Eevee rather than Red/Blue or FireRed/LeafGreen.

title: Pokemon Snakewood
description:
You awake in what used to be Littleroot town, having no memory of how you got there or even who you really are. It soon becomes apparent however that something very big has happened while you were out: Hoenn has been invaded by an army of zombies.
Working with Prof. Birch, you set off to find your brother Landon and Birch's daughter May, who have both gone missing in an attempt to find the source of the undead plague. At the same time, you try to uncover your past. On the way you face zombies, witches, demons and the enigmatic Taoist, Gleis, as well as the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, the Hoenn Internal Affairs Army, and, eventually, the architect of all this misery himself: Senex.
However, it isn't nearly as dark as all that: there are also the cheerfully insane (and improbably numerous) Deadly Seven, the unruffled and cynical Army Recruiters Tina and Bruce, and a psychic dragon's egg. Not to mention a special appearance from the Denjuu universe.

title: Pokemon Snakewood
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokemon Snowy White
description: No overview is currently available for this title, please feel free to add one.

title: Pokémon Sors
description: In the Hupest region, a Grand Eclipse 300 years ago caused Pokémon to undergo transformative changes, leading to chaos. The Eclipse project, initiated centuries later, aimed to unlock and artificially induce these changes in Pokémon. Success resulted in Solar and Lunar Forms. Asher, born amidst this, faced his parents' divorce over the project. His father, Jackson, sought to protect him from the potential risks. Eleven years later, Asher, unaware of impending chaos, embarks on an adventure, participating in the Eclipse Tournament. The narrative unfolds as Asher aspires to become the best while confronting the repercussions of Siara's actions in the region and his life, adding a layer of complexity to his journey.

title: Pokemon Sovereign of the Skies
description:
Story:
The balance of a world is about to be shaken. While the mighty Guardians of Amitec can no longer leave their stronghold, the Sacred Shards of Celestis are stolen by the cold hands of Team Tundra. Find out what this is all about, and how a simple coach suddenly carries the fate of a world, in this unique adventure!


Features:
All Pokémon up to Generation 7: all Pokémon up to Generation 7 are included.
Mega-developments & Protomorphosis: read correctly, the mega-developments are back.
Graphically unique: a completely new design, tilesets, OWs, interfaces and sprites.
New battle engine: all basic mechanics (attacks, items, abilities) follow the example of Generation 7.
New music: the music of SotS is (with a few exceptions) completely new composed.
Difficulty levels: you decide how difficult the game should be.
Day & Night System: you will see changing combat backgrounds and Pokémon depending on the time of day.
Disasters: certain actions of the antagonists have visible consequences.
New Arena Ladder System: the Arena Ladders (Guardians) are now part of the story.

title: Pokemon Static Yellow
description:
Pokémon Static Yellow- A Gen 1 Hack with QOL improvements, but also trying to keep the same vibe as Gen 1!

Experience a reimagined adventure with refined progression, exciting new features, and a world full of surprises!

title: Pokemon Stealth Pirates
description: Pokemon Stealth Pirates is a GBA ROM Hack and based on Pokemon Leaf Green by StealthPirates. It has the same story as Pokemon Leaf Green but You have multiple ways to play game. It’s fun to play in English. It’s 90% Complete and playable.

title: Pokemon Stigma Version
